name: Template
author: Daniel Buchner
description: The primary element used in templating and data inflation for custom elements

getters.name: Gets the name of the template.

setters.renderer: Allows you to use a custom rendering function.
setters.beforeRender: Gives you the chance to massage the data before calling render.
setters.name: The name of the template
setters.script: Sets the script to be ran over the template.

methods.attachTemplate: Renders the template inside the passed element.
methods.detachTemplate: Removes the association between this template and element.
methods.render: Renders all elements that are attached to this template.
methods.addTemplateListener: Adds an event listener for this template.
methods.addTemplateListeners: Adds multiple listeners for this template.
methods.removeTemplateListeners: Removes event listeners for this template.
methods.addTemplateSetters: Adds setters that allows you do update individual parts of the rendered template.

events.templatechange: Fires each time a template is changed.
